title: Discord is causing my fps to go from 200 to 10
body:
Everytime i'm in a call with friends, my fps goes to 10 with massive frame lags. 
I have a windows 10 with a gtx 1060 with 3gb. I have 16gb of memory.
I do not think this is a computer problem because when I play league, control panel says I barely use over 50% cpu and memory.
I have tried disabling overlay on discord but that hasn't helped at all.

replies.body: Hmmmmm if you already think discord is the main source of the problem with your FPS, let's test that out really quickly. Close out of discord entirely, and jump into a custom game to see how your frames react without other programs running in the background.
